item.title: Sonya Massey's family reaches $10 million settlement with Sangamon County
item.description: Massey was shot and killed in her home near Springfield last July. Former Sangamon County Sheriff's deputy Sean Grayson is charged with her murder.

item.title: Judge declines to restrict DOGE's access to Labor Department systems
item.description: Six labor unions and the Economic Policy Institute had asked the court to restrict DOGE's access to Labor Department systems.

item.title: Trump fires archivist of the United States
item.description: President Trump has fired the nation's top record keeper, Archivist of the United States Colleen J. Shogan.

item.title: Trump to fire multiple Kennedy Center board members, name himself chair
item.description: President Trump did not say which board members at the Kennedy Center he plans to terminate.

item.title: Trump orders U.S. to prioritize refugee resettlement of White Afrikaners
item.description: President Trump directed officials to prioritize the resettlement of Afrikaners in South Africa through the U.S. refugee program, which he suspended o...
